descriptors.name: wisun_soc_ddp_ram
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - DDP
descriptors.description: Wi-SUN RAM test application for Dynamic Data Provisioning (DDP) framework. It can generate and import key pairs and import certificates

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_brcli
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Border Router
descriptors.description: This demo is an out-of-the-box Wi-SUN border router application. It provides a command-line interface to control basic configurations.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_brcli_wifi
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Border Router - with SiWx917 Wi-Fi backhaul
descriptors.description: This demo is an out-of-the-box Wi-SUN border router application with SiWx971 Wi-Fi backhaul. It provides a command-line interface to control basic configurations for both Wi-SUN and Wi-Fi interface configurations.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_cli
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - CLI example
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN CLI (Command-Line Interface) sample application allows developers to easily evaluate the Wi-SUN stack APIs. The Wi-SUN command line interface provides a serial interface to a number of the Wi-SUN stack functions. For example, it can be used to connect the Wi-SUN device to a Wi-SUN border router and exchange IP packets.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_rcp
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - RCP
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN RCP (radio coprocessor) application provides a radio interface to a Linux host. It is meant to be paired with wsbrd (Wi-SUN Network implementation for Linux) to run as a Linux border router device.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|RCP Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_empty
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Empty
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Empty sample application is a bare-bones application. This application can be used as a template to develop a Wi-SUN application.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_ping
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Ping
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Ping sample application demonstrates how to use the Wi-SUN application framework and the POSIX-like socket API to implement a basic ping application.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_socket
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Socket
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Socket sample application demonstrates how to use the Wi-SUN application framework and the POSIX socket APIs to implement a basic TCP/UDP client/server application.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_coap_meter
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC CoAP Meter
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN CoAP Meter sample application demonstrates the use of the CoAP (Constrained Application Protocol) protocol to emulate a metering-like application. The CoAP Meter purpose is to send sensor measurements to a CoAP Collector device in the same Wi-SUN network.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_coap_collector
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC CoAP Collector
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN CoAP Collector sample application demonstrates the use of the CoAP (Constrained Application Protocol) to emulate a metering-like application. The CoAP Collector purpose is to retrieve measurements from the devices running the Wi-SUN CoAP Meter application in the same Wi-SUN network.

properties.value: brd2705a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4276a brd4400a brd4400b brd4400c brd4401a brd4401b brd4401c com.silabs.board.none
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Wi-SUN

descriptors.name: wisun_soc_network_measurement
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Network Measurement
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Network Measurement application provides a performance measurement solution based on the ping mechanism.
